javax.servlet.sip

Interface AttributeStore

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ForkingContext, InviteBranch, SipApplicationSession, SipServletMessage, SipServletRequest, SipServletResponse, SipSession

    public interface AttributeStore
    Interface representing a store of attributes. Attributes are objects bound to the store with a specified name. Note that this interface provide happens before concurrency guarantee that retrieval operations (getAttribute) reflects the most recently completed update operation (setAttribute and removeAttribute).
    Since:
    2.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearAttributes()
      Remove all the attributes set by the application from this attribute store.
      Object getAttribute(String name)
      Returns the object bound with the specified name in this store, or null if no object is bound under the name.
      Set<String> getAttributeNameSet()
      Returns a Set of the String objects containing the names of all the objects bound to this store.
      void removeAttribute(String name)
      Removes the object bound with the specified name from this store.
      void setAttribute(String name, Object attribute)
      Binds an object to this store, using the name specified.

    • Method Detail

      • getAttribute

        Object getAttribute(String name)
        Returns the object bound with the specified name in this store, or null if no object is bound under the name.
        Parameters:
        name - a string specifying the name of the object
        Returns:
        the object with the specified name
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if this method is called on an invalid attribute store
        NullPointerException - if the name is null

      • removeAttribute

        void removeAttribute(String name)
        Removes the object bound with the specified name from this store. If the session does not have an object bound with the specified name, this method does nothing.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the object to remove from this store
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if this method is called on an invalid attribute store

      • setAttribute

        void setAttribute(String name,
                Object attribute)
        Binds an object to this store, using the name specified. If an object of the same name is already bound to the store, the object is replaced.
        Parameters:
        name - the name to which the object is bound; cannot be null
        attribute - the object to be bound; cannot be null
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if this method is called on an invalid attribute store
        NullPointerException - if the name or attribute is null

      • getAttributeNameSet

        Set<String> getAttributeNameSet()
        Returns a Set of the String objects containing the names of all the objects bound to this store.
        Returns:
        a Set of the String objects specifying the names of all the objects bound to this store.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if this method is called on an invalid attribute store

      • clearAttributes

        void clearAttributes()
        Remove all the attributes set by the application from this attribute store.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if this method is called on an invalid attribute store
